distinct
from tenants_application
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.select:
SELECT Application_ID "applicationId", TENANT_STATUS "tenantStatus", DATE_FORMAT(add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') "addTime", TENANT_NAME "tenantName", REGISTER_PHONE "registerPhone", privince "privince", city "city", DATE_FORMAT(modify_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') "modifyTime" FROM tenants_application WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY add_time DESC limit #{pageNumber},#{pageSize}
